attributes.action: Make conscription compulsory for refugees from war torn countries
attributes.additional_details:
thousands of refugees are currently fleeing countries like Syria due to the breakout of civil war many genuine many appear to just be luxury seekers i feel like many other do that they should have to defend there home which they dont want to it should be compulsory that they under go army training to try take back there home if this is refused by the so called refugee they should be sent home regardless. 
this would help with taking back control from isis hotspots and the removal Bashar al-Assad
attributes.background: We are calling on the British government to introduce military conscription for all refugees that are currently fleeing there countries because of the breakout of war these people just appear to be looking for a better life but we feel they should be made to fight for there own country.
